modName: RA - A powerful Standalone Follower - with CUSTOM TEXTURES
summary: Have the Egyptian Deity of the Sun RA as a standalone follower, No other Mods required. Ra comes with CUSTOM TEXTURES and GLOWING EYES
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/50721-1-1391467854.png[/img]

[color=yellow]The Deity Ra has come to skyrim for mysterious reasons.[/color]

Ra is very Powerful, well.... because she's Ra. lol.

[color=yellow][b][u]LOCATION:[/u][/b][/color]

The Temple of Kynareth in Whiterun. Oh, and bring some clothes.

[color=yellow][u]BODY TYPE:[/u][/color]

CBBE.... but she's a little thicker than the default CBBE v3.
If you want the default CBBEv3 body, go to the optional files section.

[color=yellow][u]POWERS:[/u][/color]

Everything dealing with FIRE!
..... what did you expect? lol. :D

[color=yellow][u]INSTALLATION:[/u][/color]

Install using NMM, or just simply drop the files into the Skyrim Data folder in there respective places.

[color=yellow][u]PERMISSIONS:[/u][/color]

This is a NEXUS EXCLUSIVE so please don't re-upload it to another site. But feel free to use my mod otherwise, as long as you CREDIT ME and LEAVE A LINK TO MY MOD PAGE, Thanks.

[color=yellow][u]EXTRAS:[/u][/color]

I added a CBBE v3 Default for those who don't like the thicker version.
Just download it from the optional files section. THE MAIN FILE IS NOT REQUIRED FOR THIS.

[color=yellow][u]CREDITS:[/u][/color]

Me.

Calientes for my favorite body mod. [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666//?]CBBE body mod[/url]


Apachii for the best hair mod. [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168//?]Apachi Skyhair mod[/url]


Navetsea for a wonderful texture mod. [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6554/?]CBBE skin texture V2 V3[/url]

And Bethesda for a wonderful game.

[color=yellow][u]Recommended Armor Mod:[/u][/color]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30416/?]Inpou by Neo[/url]

[color=red]Note:[/color] [u]With some enb's The eyes may not glow as intended, I Do not use ENB's so I have not tested it on which ENB would be fine and which would not be fine[/u].

And if you like my mod, please come back and hit that button. :)


[color=orange][b][u]LAST BUT NOT LEAST:[/u][/b][/color]

[color=yellow][size=+2]Check out my other followers[/color][/size]

[color=orange][size=5]Midnight[/size][/color][size=5].[/size]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26369/?][img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/26369-1-1389599619.jpg[/img][/url]

[size=5]and [color=orange]Oblivion[/color].[/size]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/43187/?][img]http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/43187-1-1389598005.jpg[/img][/url]

[size=5]and [color=orange]Victoria[/color]- FIRST standalone follower EVER TO HAVE [color=#9900ff]GLOWING EYES[/color].[/size]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/44969/?][img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/44969-1-1389598781.jpg[/img][/url]

And check out my Spell Mod: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50868/?]Atom Bomb - Ultra Powerful Spell[/url]

[color=orange][size=+2]Thanks to everyone who supports my mods.[/size][/color] : )


[color=yellow]AND YOU ARE WELCOME TO UPLOAD YOUR PICTURES EVERYONE.[/color]
author: automatik25
